title.narrative: F.a: FAD: Organisational capacity building program for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing in Gambia

description.narrative: WHAT: The project supports the organizational capacity building of Gambia Association of the Deaf and Hard of Hearing in Gambia (GADHOH). The long term development objective of the project is an empowered Gambian Deaf Community so that Deaf people have a s trong positive Deaf identity and can act on equal basis with the hearing people in the society. WHY: The status of the deaf is weak in Gambia. The status of sign language as the first language of the deaf has not been recognized. The majority of the deaf l ive in poverty, without opportunities to education or a vocation. HOW: By supporting the regional activities of GADHOH the amount of their members grow and more deaf and hard of hearing grow aware about their rights. Through influencing and information dis semination the aim is to shift the attitudes of the society and influence decision making, development of services, and the realization of rights. The main beneficiaries are the deaf, their families, and the national association, giving it an opportunity t o improve its organizational capacity.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project is implemented by Gambia Association of the Deaf and Hard of Hearing GADHOH
